title: LF top laner D5+ (season 6) for FLEX Q 5 MAN
body:
Looking for a top laner who actively wants to improve for 5 man flex Q's.

Must have comms + a positive attitude

I am looking to guide 4 other players and help them improve, whilst improving myself. (3 players have been selected already, just looking for a top laner hence the post!)

I am a Season 6 Challenger peak support main and have been playing competitively for 1.5 years now. I have international experience on multiple occasions playing League and representing Australia.

Add me in game for further questions.

IGN: bluz0r

replies.body: Are you still looking, tried to add but friends list is full
